The Sapiosexual Elite

Association (SEA).

“Empowering minds”

A community for

Intellectuals

The sapio society welcomes people from every walk of life whose mind, passion and IQ is in the top 2% of the population, with the objective of enjoying each other's company, supporting community development, growing clientele, Network and participating in a wide range of social and cultural activities.

What does "Sapio" mean?

Wisdom
/
Intelligence

Aim

Building People.

Empowering Minds.

To Support and prepare the minds Nigerians and Africans as a whole (both home and abroad) for the UN 2063 goals.

Become a
Member!

Join the community of Intellectuals.
